name: Chemical Control
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Choose two of the following effects. You can't target a creature or area twice with the same effect, but you can still choose the same effect twice otherwise.
* You neutralize a non-magical chemical or poison in a 5 foot cube and transform it into water or water vapor.
* A 5 foot square surface becomes perfectly clean and dangerously slick. A creature that moves through this area without stopping must make a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
* You douse a 5 foot radius around yourself with a mild acid, dealing 1 acid damage to any other creatures in this radius.
* You change the flavor of a piece of food, or a drink, to whatever you desire.
* You clean or soil a garment or piece of armor.
